spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacency are well-preserved. However, door orientations are vague in the 3D block out. Window placements on the exterior walls match the plan adequately.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model contains hallucinated text-like markings on the floor surfaces, violating the 'no labels' constraint. The floating model and background constraints are met.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture blocks (beds, sofas, dining table) are placed accurately according to the plan with consistent scaling.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style. The isometric camera angle is correct. Deduction for minor texture artifacts on the floor representing text.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated illegible text labels/markings present on several room floors.
Floor surfaces exhibit slight noise/texture artifacts rather than pure solid flat colors.
